_header: O sweet heart dear and most best beloved
_description: A love letter — eight eight-line stanzas ababcdcd including refrain, ‘your bewtye maketh my harte to blede’, plus 1 x 4, aabb, envoy

BodRawC813.First Lines:
O swete hart dere and most best belouydhartely to yow I me
                    recommende…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…Then passe forthe letter thorowȝ þis preseand save
                    þi mastur shameles
BodRawC813.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “Liedersammlungen des xvi. Jahrhunderts…IV.” 
             Anglia
         31 (1908): 309-96: 372-4.
Jansen,  Sharon L.,  and  Kathleen H. Jordan, eds.  
             The Welles Anthology: MS. Rawlinson C.813: A Critical Edition.
         Binghamton, NY: Medieval & Renaissance Texts and Studies,
            1991: 213-16.
